about_the_game:
Ever felt uninspired, technically challenged or just bored when creating your game maps? Dungeon Alchemist is a mapmaking application for tabletop RPG's that enables you to make amazing, high-quality maps in seconds! Simply pick a theme, start drawing, and Dungeon Alchemist creates high-quality maps you can print, share, or use in your favourite Virtual Tabletop Application. Walls, floors, objects and lighting are generated for you automatically, so you can focus on the big picture!

PICK A THEME

Dungeon Alchemist comes jam-packed full of exciting and inspiring objects and settings. Start your mapmaking adventure by picking one of our themes.

MAKE THE MAP OF YOUR DREAMS

With just a few clicks, Dungeon Alchemist will conjure a beautiful landscape that will inspire you and your players. You choose the theme of each room, and Dungeon Alchemist will do the rest. Don't like what you get? Just press the randomize button and Dungeon Alchemist's procedural algorithms will generate ever new rooms for you.

TWEAK UNTIL IT'S JUST RIGHT

You can tweak your map to your heart's content. Add, scale, remove and rotate objects, move doors, change floor tiles, recolor potions, set things on fire and so much more!

DISCLAIMER: NO GENERATIVE AI

Dungeon Alchemist does not use any generative AI/LLM's for its room generation. All procedural algorithms are developed in-house and only use content generated by our own, paid artists.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 973
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 973 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Dungeon Alchemist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 973
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
